author: cora
long_description:
# Operetta Music
A collection of historical operetta recordings for `mcla_music_api`.

## Credits
*  [Grant Raymond Barrett - My name is John Wellington Wells - Gilbert & Sullivan's "The Sorcerer" 1877](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:My_Name_Is_John_Wellington_Wells.ogg) [cc-by 3.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en)
* [George Baker - "I am the very model of a modern Major-General" from Gilbert and Sullivan's The Pirates of Penzance Public Domain (1921)](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Sullivan_-_The_Pirates_of_Penzance_-_I_am_the_very_model_of_a_modern_Major-General_(Baker,_1921).mp3) [Public Domain](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/)
* [The Royal Philharmonic Orchestra - "A british tar" from Gilbert and Sullivan's HMS Pinafore](https://archive.org/details/h.m.s.-pinafore-by-gilbert-sullivan-lp/2+Act+I+(Part+2).mp3) [Public Domain](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/)
* [The Royal Philharmonic Orchestra - "When I was a lad / Ruler of the Queen's Navy" from Gilbert and Sullivan's HMS Pinafore]( https://archive.org/details/h.m.s.-pinafore-by-gilbert-sullivan-lp/2+Act+I+(Part+2).mp3) [Public Domain](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/)
* [The US Marine Band - El Capitan from El Capitan by John Philip Sousa](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:El_Capitan_-_United_States_Marine_Band.ogg) - [cc-by 3.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en)
* [Edith Day, Columbia Broadway - Romance from Desert Song by Sigmund Romberg 1926](https://archive.org/details/desert27) [Public Domain](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/)
* [Harry Welchman, Columbia Broadway - One Alone from Desert Song by Sigmund Romberg 1926](https://archive.org/details/desert27) [Public Domain](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/)
* [The Winter Garden Theatre Orchestra - The Cabaret Girl by Jerome Kern 1922](https://archive.org/details/c-1086-cagirl22) [Public Domain](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/)
* [Mizzi GÃ¼nther, Mizzi Wirth, Karl Streitmann and Ludwig Herold - Das Lied der Dollarprinzessin from Die Dollarprinzessin by Leo Fall 1907](https://archive.org/details/dollar07/dollar076-2-44298.mp3) [Public Domain](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/)
* [Peter Dawson - The Cobbler's Song from Chu Chin Chow by Frederic Norton 1917](https://archive.org/details/chuchi17) [Public Domain](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/)
* [Violet Loraine - Let the great big world keep turning from The Bing Girls are there by Nat D. Ayer 1917](https://archive.org/details/03552-binggi17) [Public Domain](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/)
